description: This program creates the single subject (ss) HTML review script '@ss_review_html' which generates images and text for the afni_proc.py quality control (APQC) HTML.

uvar_json.title: User variables JSON file
uvar_json.description: Text file of user variables created by gen_ss_review.py that catalogs important files in the results directory for the APQC.

subj_dir.title: Subject directory
subj_dir.description: Location of AP results directory (often '.', as this program is often run from within the AP results directory).

review_style.title: Review style
review_style.description: The 'style' of the APQC HTML output HTML. Allowed keywords are: {none, basic, pythonic}. Using 'pythonic' is recommended.

mot_grayplot_off.title: Motion grayplot off flag
mot_grayplot_off.description: Turn off the grayplot generation. This option was created for a specific case with a large dataset. Not recommended to use generally.

vstat_list.title: Vstat list
vstat_list.description: Provide a list of label items to specify which volume's images should appear in the vstat QC block. Each item should correspond to subbrick label basename in the stats_dset. 'Full_Fstat' is always included. If not used, default logic picks up to 5 items to show.
